properties.body:
MARITIME SAFETY WEBSITES.
1. NGA CONTINUES TO EXPERIENCE SOME TECHNICAL
   DIFFICULTIES AND USERS MAY STILL EXPERIENCE
   PROBLEMS ACCESSING CAC ENABLED/NIPRNET
   MARITIME SAFETY WEBSITES AND ESYNC.
   HOWEVER, MOST USERS SHOULD NOW BE ABLE
   TO ACCESS THESE SITES.
2. USERS THAT ARE STILL EXPERIENCING ISSUES CAN ACCESS
   DNC VDU PATCHES ON THE WWW AT HTTPS:DNC.NGA.MIL
   OR FULL UPDATED DNC LIBRARIES ON THE SIPRNET
   AT HTTP://DNC.NGA.SMIL.MIL.
3. USERS CAN ALSO ACCESS ESYNC OUTSIDE OF THE
   NGA NETWORK TO MAINTAIN DNC AND ENC AT
   HTTPS://EDGESYNC.DISTANCESUPPORT.NAVY.MIL/ESYNC.
4. FOR URGENT SERVICE CONTACT NGA NAVSAFETY,
   DSN: 547 5455, COMM: 800 362 6289 OR 571 557 5455,
   E-MAIL: NAVSAFETY@NGA.MIL, OR MSG TO
   NGA NAVSAFETY WASHINGTON DC.
5. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3039/22.
